title: Who is Divya Khosla Kumar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Divya Khosla Kumar (born 20 November 1981) is an Indian film Actress,Producer and Director. She has directed various advertisements and has also featured in some music videos. She is the wife of Bhushan Kumar, the chairman and managing director of T-Series music label and film production company.. Profession: Producer, Film director, Film actress Film: Yaariyan, Sanam Re Born: 20 November 1981 Nationality: Indian     and one more thing she is hottest director i ever saw…..

Divya Khosla Kumar (born 20 November 1981) is an Indian film Actress,Producer and Director. She has directed various advertisements and has also featured in some music videos. She is the wife of Bhushan Kumar, the chairman and managing director of T-Series music label and film production company
